metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1051 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
It was found that the fix for CVE-2016-9606 in versions 3.0.22 and 3.1.2 was incomplete and Yaml unmarshalling in Resteasy is still possible via `Yaml.load()` in YamlProvider.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1051` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libresteasy3.0-java - 3.0.26-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: msalvatore> Incomplete fix for CVE-2016-9606 not applied. That fix just disables the YamlProvider by default. There is no fix for this issue other than to mitigate it by requiring authentication and authorization on endpoints expecting YAML input.

criterions.comment: resteasy3.0 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.26-1').
